condition.narrative: Effective Date + 12 months: each MC has developed an action plan for the implementation of its drinking water strategy and startedto implement it (PA, Schedule, Section I.C.3).
Effective Date + 24 months: each Utility has implemented its Transition Plan (assets transferred and staff in place) (PA, Schedule,Section I.C.1(c)(ii)).
Effective Date + 3 months: each MC has incorporated its Utility and appointed its Board Members (PA, Schedule, Section I.C.1(b)).
Effective Date + 6 months: each Utility has prepared its Transition Plan, including for staffing and transfer of relevant municipalassets (PA, Schedule, Section I.C.1(c)(i)).
Effectiveness + 1 month: adoption of Project Operations Manual
Standard Annual Work Plan and Budget covenants
